games.title: Avatar Maker
games.description: Create custom avatars with notification badges! Upload your photo or choose from preset images, then add notification numbers to create fun profile pictures that will drive perfectionists crazy.
games.controls: Tap 'Add Image' to upload your photo or select from preset images below. Choose a notification number from the dropdown menu, then tap 'Generate Avatar' to create your custom profile picture.
games.author: LightGame Team

games.title: Baba Game
games.description: A fun casual game where you mark places you've visited. Explore different locations and collect achievements!
games.controls: Use mouse or touch to interact with the game interface. Click on locations to mark them as visited.
games.author: LightGame Team

games.title: Beat the Cat
games.description: Tired of seeing that neurotic cat all over your social feed? Now it's time to beat it! A fun casual game that tests your reaction speed and hand-eye coordination.
games.controls: Click on the cat to beat it before it escapes. The faster your reaction, the higher your score!
games.author: LightGame Team
features: Simple and easy to play gameplay

games.title: Bun Eating Contest
games.description: A fun casual game where you see how many steamed buns you can eat in a limited time! Test your speed and reaction skills.
games.controls: Click on the buns to eat them. Try to eat as many as possible within the time limit to get a high score.
games.author: LightGame Team

games.title: Cheating Rate Test
games.description: Take this psychological test to discover your cheating probability! Answer 10 questions honestly and find out how likely you are to be unfaithful in relationships.
games.controls: Click or tap to select answers for each question. Navigate through the quiz using the provided buttons.
games.author: Quiz Studio

games.title: Ice Bucket Challenge
games.description: Take on the viral Ice Bucket Challenge! See how many buckets you can pour in 10 seconds. Test your speed and reflexes in this fun arcade game.
games.controls: Hold down mouse button or touch and hold to pour water. Release to stop pouring. Try to pour as many buckets as possible within the time limit.
games.author: Game Studio

games.title: None Can Die
games.description: A challenging puzzle game where you must keep everyone alive. Test your reflexes and strategic thinking in this addictive game that's hard to put down!
games.controls: Use mouse or touch to control the game. Follow on-screen instructions to keep all characters alive.
games.author: Game Studio

games.title: OCD Challenge 2
games.description: A challenging puzzle game that tests your patience and precision. Clear all the notification badges to satisfy your OCD tendencies. Perfect for those who love organizing and completing tasks.
games.controls: Tap on notification badges to clear them. Clear all badges to complete each level. Be careful not to miss any!
games.author: LightGame Team

games.title: Pac-Dots
games.description: A classic Pac-Man style game where you collect dots while avoiding enemies. Navigate through the maze and try to achieve the highest score possible!
games.controls: Use arrow keys or swipe gestures to move your character. Collect all dots while avoiding enemies. Get power-ups to turn the tables!
games.author: Arcade Studio

games.title: Racing Chase
games.description: An exciting racing game where you drive luxury cars and chase targets. Navigate through traffic, avoid obstacles, and achieve high scores in this fast-paced driving adventure.
games.controls: Use touch controls to steer your car. Avoid obstacles and collect targets. The more targets you collect, the higher your score!
games.author: LightGame Team

games.title: Rescue Mission
games.description: An exciting rescue mission game where you help save people in need. Navigate through challenges and obstacles to complete your heroic mission successfully.
games.controls: Tap and drag to move characters. Avoid obstacles and collect items to help with the rescue mission. Complete objectives to progress through levels.
games.author: LightGame Team

games.title: Snake Game
games.description: The classic Snake game where you control a snake to eat food and grow longer. Be careful not to hit the walls or yourself!
games.controls: Use Arrow Keys to move the snake. Eat the food to grow longer. Avoid hitting walls and your own tail.

games.title: Space Shooter
games.description: Defend Earth from waves of alien invaders in this classic arcade-style space shooter. Dodge enemy fire and collect power-ups to upgrade your weapons.
games.controls: Use Arrow Keys or WASD to move your spaceship. Press Space to shoot. Avoid enemy ships and their projectiles.

games.title: Steps of Wonder
games.description: A challenging puzzle game that tests your intelligence and strategy. Push your thinking to the limit. Every step matters in this thrilling brain teaser!
games.controls: Click on the blocks to move them. Try to solve the puzzle with as few steps as possible. Careful thinking and planning is required for each move.
games.author: LightGame Team

games.title: Tetris
games.description: The classic block-stacking puzzle game. Arrange falling blocks to create complete lines and prevent the blocks from stacking up to the top.
games.controls: Use Arrow Left/Right to move, Arrow Down to speed up descent, Arrow Up to rotate, Space to hard drop.

games.title: Tower Defense
games.description: Classic tower defense game where you build defensive towers to prevent enemy invasion. Plan your resources wisely and survive 10 waves of enemies!
games.controls: Click to select tower type, then click on the map to place it. Basic Tower ($50): Normal attack; Cannon Tower ($100): High damage; Ice Tower ($150): Slows enemies.
games.author: LightGame Team
features: Three different types of defense towers: Basic Tower, Cannon Tower, and Ice Tower
Multiple enemy types including Normal, Fast, and Tank enemies
10 waves of enemies with increasing difficulty
Resource management system to allocate money for building towers
